DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to compare the single-dose relative bioavailability of Reddy Cheminor and Merck &Co, pepcid 40 mg famotidine tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study of Famotidine Tablets 40 mg Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : The study was conducted as an open-label, randomized, single-dose, 2-way crossover, relative bioavailability study performed on 30 healthy adult male volunteers. A total of 30 subjects completed the clinical phase of the study. Single oral 40 mg doses were separated by a washout period of 7 days.
